education.degree: Tech Bootcamp, Computer User Support Specialist Program

bullets: Resolved advanced escalations from Tier 1 helpdesk across multiple clients, handling complex networking, system, and endpoint issues.
Directed client onboarding projects end-to-end, from requirements gathering through deployment, ensuring seamless transitions.
Completed infrastructure upgrades and troubleshooting during multi-day onsite engagements under strict deadlines.
Configured, secured, and troubleshot SonicWall and Sophos firewalls to enhance client security posture.
Administered VMware ESXi environments, remediating host and VM-level failures to maintain uptime.
Diagnosed Windows Server and Active Directory issues including GPOs, authentication, and domain outages.
Reduced repeat tickets by documenting solutions, training Tier 1 staff, and standardizing recurring fixes.
Delivered onsite support for desktops and laptops, replacing RAM, drives, and displays to minimize downtime.
Maintained network infrastructure by replacing switches, UniFi Cloud Keys, and UPS batteries, while reorganizing network closets for reliability.
Supported migration and onboarding projects by imaging and deploying devices for end users.
Participated in ransomware incident response, reimaging endpoints and restoring organizational productivity.
Documented troubleshooting steps and contributed to internal knowledge base for consistent team practices.
Served as primary escalation point for Tier 1 staff, managing complex technical issues and mentoring new technicians.
Authored process documentation and delivered training to improve first-call resolution.
Supported server patching and monthly updates alongside the systems administrator.
Monitored and verified Veeam backups, ensuring reliability of disaster recovery.
Collaborated on Active Directory cleanup projects, removing obsolete accounts and standardizing user provisioning.
Integrated applications with Azure AD to enable Single Sign-On, reducing password management burden.
Implemented Intune and Autopilot for hybrid device provisioning, creating applications and configuration profiles.
Coordinated annual PC refresh project, managing device setup, tracking progress, and recommending hardware specs.
Streamlined operations by developing PowerShell scripts for device tracking, Chrome bookmark backup, and automation tasks.
Delivered Microsoft Office Suite training and daily support for end users.
Configured Microsoft Teams Rooms with both hardware and software deployments.
Assisted networking team with VPN, switch rewiring, access points, and cabling tasks.
Applied time management, multitasking, and organizational discipline to balance competing demands.
Communicated directly with customers to ensure accurate requirements and high-quality service delivery.
Conducted complex signal analysis with advanced technical tools.
Collaborated with teams to share intelligence and improve communication channels.
Developed expertise in data analysis and technical problem solving.

overview.name: Chad Lindemood
overview.summary: IT professional focused on building secure, reliable, and scalable systems across cloud, network, and endpoint environments. Experienced in tackling complex technical challenges, leading projects from start to finish, and strengthening infrastructure through hands-on expertise and industry certifications.
overview.title: Tier 2 Escalations Technician

bullets: Created an interactive lab using AI tools to build a resume-focused website.
Containerized the application with Docker and orchestrated it using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).
Deployed the site to Azure for public access and scalability testing.
This is that website!
projects.name: Resume Creation Lab

bullets: Built an advanced EVE-NG topology simulating a branch office network.
Configured dynamic routing with OSPF, inter-VLAN routing, and port security.
Implemented SNMP monitoring and Syslog forwarding.
Validated resiliency by simulating link failures and verifying failover.
projects.name: Advanced Cisco Enterprise Network Lab

bullets: Deployed a pfSense firewall and connected it to both Windows and Linux VMs.
Configured stateful firewall rules, VLAN segmentation, and port forwarding.
Tested security by running controlled nmap scans and logging alerts.
projects.name: Firewall and Intrusion Detection Lab

bullets: Deployed a small website to Azure App Service.
Configured IAM and RBAC roles for secure access management.
Used Azure Storage to host static content and compared performance.
projects.name: Cloud Foundations Deployment

bullets: Set up a Windows Server VM running Active Directory Domain Services.
Joined Windows 10 clients to the domain, created user accounts, and tested Group Policies.
Integrated an Azure AD trial tenant for hybrid identity experiments.
projects.name: Active Directory & Endpoint Management Lab

bullets: Built a small Packet Tracer lab with 2 routers, 2 switches, and multiple VLANs.
Configured static routing, DHCP, NAT, and ACLs to restrict traffic between VLANs.
Documented a basic network topology and simulated external internet access.
projects.name: Basic Secure Network Lab
